content: whenever friends have babies i want to do something for them this typically means a blanket my go-to pattern is a simple two-color one that starts with one stitch and expands diagonally you could make this blanket arbitrarily large or small for that matter you could use more than just two colors i love knit picks shine worsted for my baby blankets because it is wonderfully soft shiny and machine-washable obviously you can pick whatever yarn you like in whatever weight the choices are endless the samples are knit using 3 balls of each color
